TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader extends System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader

Docs.summary: A class that wraps a specified reader and delegates all calls to the wrapped reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The reader that is wrapped can be accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader.InnerReader%2A> property. Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader.InitializeInnerReader%2A> method to set the wrapped reader and initialize the property.

Docs.summary: Reads large streams of text embedded in an XML document.
Docs.returns: The number of characters read into the buffer. The value zero is returned when there is no more text content.
